<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wind Caller](/Feats.aspx?ID=4740) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[storm order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

You bid the winds to aid you, carrying you through the air and allowing you passage through the strongest headwinds. You gain the [_stormwind flight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1859) order spell.

<title level="2">Wind Caller leads to...</title>
[Invoke Disaster](/Feats.aspx?ID=4762)
name: Wind Caller
